[comment] ui_template: Yes ui_template_name: leftonly [/comment] [set page_title]__COMPANY__ -- Shipping Address Removed[/set] [set page_banner]Shipping Address Removed[/set] @_LEFTONLY_TOP_@ [perl] my $dbname = 'ship_addresses'; my @addresses = split /\0/, $Values->{remove_sa}; my $sql_req = "delete from $dbname WHERE code = "; $sql_req .= join(' or code = ', @addresses); $Scratch->{sql_req} = $sql_req; return ""; [/perl] [tag flag write]ship_addresses[/tag] [seti remove_addresses][query sql="[scratch sql_req]"][/query][/seti]
The selected shipping addresses have been removed.
